    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Attack
    A physical attack card that deals damage based on its rarity.
    BattleView
    The battle UI view responsible for rendering and driving a single battle scene.
    Berserker
    Represents a Berserker-type enemy, which is a miniboss-class entity.
    Blockable
    Marker interface indicating that an enemy can physical-based block of attacks.
    Boss
    Represents a Boss-class enemy.
    Card
    Base abstract class for all cards used in the game's combat system.
    CongratView
    The CongratView class represents the victory screen displayed when the player wins a battle.
    DeckPool
    Represents a pool of cards used for random card drawing.
    Enemy
    Base abstract class representing any enemy in the game.
    EnemyType
    Enumeration of enemy categories used by the game logic.
    GameController
    Controls the overall game flow, coordinating interaction between the deck, turn system, player, and game logic.
    GameLogic
    Central game state and progression manager.
    GameLogic.RewardInfo
    Simple value object describing reward composition presented to the player after special encounters (typically minibosses).
    GearSlot
    Enumeration of equippable gear slots available to the player.
    Hand
    Represents the player's current hand of cards during a turn.
    Heal
    A healing card that restores the player's health based on its rarity.
    Mage
    Represents a Mage enemy that specializes in magic-based attacks.
    Magic
    A magic-based attack card that deals damage according to its rarity.
    MagicBlockable
    Marker interface indicating that an enemy has resistance to magic-based attacks.
    Main
    Entry point of the game application and central navigation manager.
    Player
    Represents the player character in the game.
    RewardView
    RewardView presents the rewards screen shown after clearing a stage/miniboss.
    Shaman
    Represents a Shaman enemy, categorized as a EnemyType.MINIBOSS.
    Slime
    Represents a basic Slime enemy.
    SlimeKing
    Represents the Slime King, a miniboss-tier variant of the standard Slime.
    Special_Effect
    A utility card that applies status effects instead of dealing damage or healing.
    StageClearView
    StageClearView represents the intermediate screen shown after an enemy has been defeated.
    StartMenuView
    StartMenuView represents the game's main menu screen.
    TurnManager
    Coordinates per-turn gameplay: drawing the player's hand, playing cards, resolving end-of-turn actions, and running enemy turns.
    TurnResult
    Represents the various outcomes that may occur at the end of a turn, particularly after the enemy takes its action.
    Warrior
    Represents a Warrior enemy, a melee-focused attacker.
